MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA15 postcode area of Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:39am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57am on Thursday, 18th February 2021
